verbose_text: To compare the sensitivity of excitatory and inhibitory components of the spinal motor circuitry to d-serine, we performed experiments in which inhibitory transmission was blocked by the glycine receptor (GlyR) antagonist strychnine (1 muM) and the GABA A -channel antagonist picrotoxin (60 muM).
